author: omalley
msg: These are the added files for my ill-fated attempt to add MR2037.

author: omalley
msg: MAPREDUCE-1959 Removes resolution of the JT short name from the Job client. Contributed by Kan Zhang.
+  MAPREDUCE-1959 Removes resolution of the JT short name from the Job client.

author: omalley
msg: [MR2037] (dking) records time, CPU time, VM kbytes and
phys mem kbytes at interim progress points during task execution.
Flows to job history task attempt completions or failures, and then
flows into rumen traces as clockSplits, cpuUsages, vMemKbytes, and
physMemKbytes .  Number of splits you get is controlled by cluster
+   [MR2037] (dking) records time, CPU time, VM kbytes and
+  phys mem kbytes at interim progress points during task execution.
+  Flows to job history task attempt completions or failures, and then
+  flows into rumen traces as clockSplits, cpuUsages, vMemKbytes, and
+  physMemKbytes .  Number of splits you get is controlled by cluster
